ygData.subject: Re: Well, the patch is in...
ygData.msgSnippet: Thank you, I was just trying to get help.  I joined this list so that I could get help and discuss things.  I thought that was what this was for. I heard that
ygData.messageBody:
Thank you, I was just trying to get help. I joined this list so that I
could get help and discuss things. I thought that was what this was for.

I heard that there was a quest where you are given a mold and you have to
smith a weapon. Has anyone else heard about this and what smithing skill
should we be at before we waste the mold by not being skillfull enough ?

Also, does the studded leather armor have any magic properties or just a
better armor class. Could we get an Enchanter to enchant the metal studs
to do this ?

Tanaman
Lev. 13 Paladin.
Veeshan
